name: prowlarr
description: Prowlarr is a self-hosted indexer manager for Usenet and torrent indexers. It integrates with Radarr, Sonarr, and Lidarr for managing indexer sources and fetching metadata via a unified UI.
features: Indexer management: Centrally manage Usenet and torrent indexers for all your *arr applications.
Automatic sync: Synchronize indexer configurations across Radarr, Sonarr, Lidarr, and Readarr automatically.
Search aggregation: Search across all configured indexers simultaneously from a unified interface.
Indexer testing: Test indexer connectivity and search capabilities to ensure proper configuration.
Category mapping: Map indexer categories to application-specific categories for accurate results.
Statistics tracking: Monitor indexer performance, success rates, and response times.
Custom filters: Create filters to exclude unwanted results based on size, quality, or other criteria.
Proxy support: Route indexer traffic through proxies or VPNs for privacy and access.
API integration: Connect with download clients and applications using standardized APIs.
Notification system: Receive alerts for indexer failures, configuration issues, or health problems.
History tracking: View search history and indexer usage across all connected applications.
Flaresolverr support: Bypass Cloudflare protection on indexers using Flaresolverr integration.
